name: 10th anniversary of the disaster at the Chornobyl Nuclear Power Plant.
generalDescription: The coin is sued to mark the 10th anniversary of the disaster at the Chornobyl Nuclear Power Plant.
averseDescription: On the coin obverse on the coin obverse there is the Small State Emblem of Ukraine in the middle of the beads circumference decoration, framed with guelder-rose sprays. Above the State Emblem there is the year of issue:1996. Around the coin circumference there are inscriptions: УКРАЇНА at the upper part and 2 МІЛЬЙОНИ КАРБОВАНЦІВ at the lower part in three rows . Under the State Emblem there are designations of Аg 925 and 31.1, coin pure weight.
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is a bell depiction in the coin centre with the inscription ЧОРНОБИЛЬ upon it. Beneath the bell there is a strip with the inscription 1986-1996. On the background there are flying cranes: three - left from the bell and two - to its right. Around the coin circumference there is an inscription: ТРАГЕДІЯ ПОДВИГ ЗАСТЕРЕЖЕННЯ. Words are separated with dots from one another and from the strip.
